frontend.components.compare package¶

Submodules¶

frontend.components.compare.compareScreen module¶

class frontend.components.compare.compareScreen.CompareScreen(**kwargs)¶

Bases: kivymd.uix.boxlayout.MDBoxLayout

This Screen is designed to compare the listings saved to wishlist. It consists of boxlayouts, one for each listing

load_bookmarked()¶

This function reads the json’s stored in /bookmarks. It then proceeds to initialize the widgets for each listing It adds all the widget to the boxlayout. Finally, it checks which listing has the lowest price/highest rating and add tags accordingly. The lowest price cannot be 0 and the best rated listing must have at least 10 ratings.

remove_wishlist_superboxes()¶

This function removes all the widgets added to the comparescreen. This is necessary since on entry all listings stored in json file will be added to comparescreen - ultimately avoiding duplicates.

class frontend.components.compare.compareScreen.ContentReviews(**kwargs)¶

Bases: kivymd.uix.boxlayout.MDBoxLayout

required for .kv file
